title: Modern Duplex Escape with Rooftop Deck and Garage in Pila Suburb
description: Step into contemporary living with this bright and spacious duplex, boasting a stylish modern façade and elevated detail throughout. With 3 welcoming bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, and thoughtfully integrated built-in wardrobes, the home delivers tranquility plus ease. Natural light flows through open living spaces, leading to a striking private rooftop deck, perfect for barbecues or relaxed evenings. Enjoy secure vehicle access via an automatic gate and direct entry to your underground garage.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in the low-density Suburb neighborhood of Pila, this peaceful area is ideal for those preferring quiet over city bustle. It offers a safe, community-oriented atmosphere without sacrificing connectivity thanks to direct access to the highway—bringing both workplaces and leisure options within comfortable reach. Green surrounds invite morning runs, while wide, tree-lined roads enhance the neighborhood vibe.
lifestyle_benefits: ideal for remote work, commuting professionals
serene surroundings for better focus and relaxation
target_buyer: Ambitious professionals or young families relocating to Pila for work who value tranquility, space, and contemporary comfort, with easy commuting.
market_positioning: A standout option for modern professionals in Pila Suburb, offering flexibility, security, and unique amenities less common in this peaceful locale—all at a highly competitive market price for its category.
